extendedInfo.description: Keep your STAR WARSâ¢: The Old Republicâ¢ account protected with the official Star Wars: The Old Republic Mobile Security Key app for your Android device!** Never miss a sale with the EA Daily Deals widget! Download today and discover the best play every day. **The Star Wars: The Old Republic Mobile Security Key app is an optional program that will allow you to apply an additional layer of protection to your Star Wars: The Old Republic account by generating a unique, one-time passcode that you can use in addition to your regular password. By using the Star Wars: The Old Republic Mobile Security Key app your account is now more secure from hackers, Trojans and other unauthorized users.How To Use:  Once you have installed the app on your android device youâll need to visit www.StarWarsTheOldRepublic.com to associate the Mobile Security Key with your account.  Log in to the Star Wars: The Old Republic web site and go to the My Account page (link on the upper right of the page).  From the menu on the right side of the page choose Security Key and then follow the instructions to set up your Mobile Security Key.Airtime or Wi-Fi connection required for use.For more information on how to register the Star Wars: The Old Republic Mobile Security Key app to your Star Wars: The Old Republic account, please visit www.swtor.com/support.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'m a subscriber - get over it. If you were one before your key will still work. It does its job providing my key when I need it. Happy.
reviews.author: Tara Novella

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: IPhone version was better.  Numbers are stupidly tiny and half the time the program displays the numbers in black so you can\'t see them
reviews.author: Christopher Willoughby

reviews.title: Does not work with Preferred or Free accounts!!!
reviews.comment: Good idea to use one of these to further secure your account... But Only if you\'re a subscriber! spent 2.5hrs on hold to find this out. dont waste your time with this Preferred and Free players, you\'ll have to purchase a keyfob from Origin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Subcribers only
reviews.comment: LAME apparently this app is for subcribers only. Maybe in the future I will be able to use Cartel Coins to purchase the use of this app.
reviews.author: Kirigaya Kazuto

reviews.title: Conflicting
reviews.comment: Actually guys if you back out of the key app instead of home and then run again, the old colors come back (orange/yellow). It\'s conflicting with the company software that powers the security key.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only 2 Stars, Only shows code in color 1 time.
reviews.comment: This app would be 5 stars, IF it would display the code more than 1 time in the light yellow color.  After you restart your phone, or the app, you are able to see the code bright and clearly, after each use, the code turns black, and is nearly unable to read.  Fail bioware, Fail ea, fail EAware.
reviews.author: Deon Grein

reviews.title: For real?
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game but I run into terrible problems with everything Biofail has made for it. Where the hell is this \"info\" button. You put an in-game vendor for authenticated accounts only and then make it a dam headache to authenticate your account, what is this garbage? Come on guys.
reviews.author: Kyle Toland

reviews.title: Frustration!
reviews.comment: It is very frustrating to get this far in the process to find out security keys are restricted to subscribers. I\'m fine with that fact, but there should be a disclaimer stating this restriction on the FAQ if not the security key set up page itself. I\'ve not seen the devs be shy about warnings of this type anywhere else, why start here?
reviews.author: Maeghi Mi\303\251rcoles

reviews.title: Requires Subscription to Activate
reviews.comment: It is beyond stupid to require a subscription to allow the extra security to be added to the account. Protecting your account should be available to all players. Complete fail EA!
reviews.author: BJ Ehrenberg

reviews.title: Never had a problem with a key app but....
reviews.comment: this one doesn\'t do anything actually, the above first screen is as far as I get.... not sure what I am supposed to do but there is no information button I can press to get the security key from. Anyway, was just looking for another way to secure my account but apparently I will HAVE to buy a physical one since this app doesn\'t actually work
reviews.author: TJ Madore Jr

reviews.title: Tech Fix for Black Text
reviews.comment: If you have the black text issue, it is because of a ram/memory issue on *your* phone. I have the Galaxy S3, and after reboot if it has the black text I just close it out, hold the middle button, click the trash icon on the bottom right to close all programs and then click the icon on the bottom left go into the task manager section where I click on the ram section and click \"clear memory\" Reopen this SWTOR program and yellow text again. ;)  (takes me 8 seconds or less to apply this fix, and I rarely have to do it because in 5 restarts i have only had this issue reduplicate itself twice.
reviews.author: Barry Klontz

reviews.title: Does it require a physical security key?
reviews.comment: When I opened the app, it asked my for my serial number and activation key. Does that mean it requires you to already have a physical security key? There\'s no point in getting the app if you have to buy the stupid security key anyway. . .
reviews.author: Megan Hackett

reviews.title: Works great, saved me $4.99
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it\'s supposed to.  You have to read the description.   For those who can\'t get it to work because of the activation code:  you must go to the website to associate the key to your account.   You will be given the activation code on the website and will then be able to setup your Mobile Security Key.
reviews.author: Hal Frieden

reviews.title: Blackout
reviews.comment: Security code numbers blackout if you hit the home key and reopen, instead of backing out. This make the numbers very difficult to read.  Its partially a user fixable issue, with behavior modification, but this doesn\'t happen with other authentication apps.  Also, a widget would be nice.
reviews.author: Jade Redmond

reviews.title: Fix Text Color Issue
reviews.comment: Great app but need to fix text bug the text is black until a reboot of the phone galaxy note II, then it shows in the color it should for 1 time, after that back to black :s.
reviews.author: Michael McGough

reviews.title: Wait, what
reviews.comment: So I needed to buy a security key to use this? Why do I need this App if I already have the security key? I\'m looking to bypass the security key. Please help, this is really confusing.
reviews.author: Andrew Salazar

reviews.title: Useless for free accounts.
reviews.comment: There\'s no way to use this if you only have a free account. The kicker is they don\'t give you this information on their site. I had to dig for it. Finally found a forum where a GM said free accounts can\'t use it.
reviews.author: Pat Brown

reviews.title: Black on black numbers!
reviews.comment: Please fix. Only on ocassion are the numbers orange as they should be. Glad I can force sideways rotation to get a soso view
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: But I find that most of the time my code is displayed in black instead of gold, making it very difficult to read. Samsung Galaxy S II LTE, Jellybean.
reviews.author: Mike Bourgeois

reviews.title: Works as intended
reviews.comment: I seem to be reading a lot of reviews of people having issues with the setup and use of this app.  I personally had no issue whatsoever since the day i installed and activated it, I followed all the clear instructions that were given and put in the numbers then it worked, every time i open it, it works, i have not had the black text issue and i wouldn\'t be upset about a company not supporting something for \"FREE\" accounts because i am not loosing anything by not paying for it so those of you crying about the free account not working with this just go buy a copy and be treated like a paying customer.  And i have had the app for about 6 months now so yes it gets used plenty.  AT&T Galaxy Note II
reviews.author: Armando Perez
